author: Simon Difford
description: Long, creamy and filling banana drink with a 'dirty' flavour and colour courtesy of coffee liqueur. The riper the banana used in this cocktail the better. Brown spots = tasty cocktail. This cocktail makes for a filling dessert so consider splitting this recipe between two 10oz Highball glasses and sharing with a friend, or for a smaller single-serve:Dirty Banana (half-sized recipe)Glass: Highball (6oz - 10oz /18cl - 30cl)Garnish: Banana chunk on rimMethod: BLEND all ingredients with half 6oz scoop crushed ice.30ml (1oz) Light rum (mellow white/gold 1-3 year old)15ml (½oz) Coffee liqueur15ml (½oz) Crème de banana30ml (1oz) Single cream/half-and-half1/2 fresh Banana (peeled)
name: Dirty Banana
